content.raw:
I don't think I say in here that `Ignition Gazebo` is `Gazebo`, although that may have slipped through somewhere.

I put these leading sentences here for promotional value, to indicate where Ignition Gazebo came from, and to get readers excited about Ignition Gazebo. It's definitely a bit of an overstatement that this is "the leading open source robotics simulator". If someone wants to call BS on us, then that's fine and they can also tell me what "leading" means to them in this context. I'd rather spread the word that this is the place to go for robotics simulation than turn people away.
content.html:
I don't think I say in here that Ignition Gazebo is Gazebo, although that may have slipped through somewhere.

I put these leading sentences here for promotional value, to indicate where Ignition Gazebo came from, and to get readers excited about Ignition Gazebo. It's definitely a bit of an overstatement that this is "the leading open source robotics simulator". If someone wants to call BS on us, then that's fine and they can also tell me what "leading" means to them in this context. I'd rather spread the word that this is the place to go for robotics simulation than turn people away.
